_header: Gay the holy pope that good man was and hend
Subjects: Caius, pope, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Life of Pope Caius, in one MS of the South English Legendary

Bod779.First Lines:
Gaye þe holy pope þat goodman was & hendeȝwas of
                    dyoclisianus þe emperourus kende…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…Now Ihesu crist for þe loue þat he loued seint
                    gayþat he vs ȝeue his blessing so wel so he may
Bod779.Editions:
Horstmann,  Carl. 
             “Des Ms. Bodl. 779 jüngere Zusatzlegenden zur südlichen
                Legendensammlung.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         82 (1889): 307-422: 401-3.
